Reviews.Content: Don't expect any more than the basics! My friend and I stayed here for three nights on a sightseeing visit. The hotel is basic, and the rate is a little more than was worth it. However, having said that, the room was spotlessly clean, beds were comfortable, fully air-conditioned and heated. TV channels as expected - CNN and the likes. We had a balcony overlooking the street below which was nice.A one minute walk from the Rambla, right in the centre - just behind the Lyceum Theatre - the street the hotel sits on is a little ropey - pickpockets at work! We could see them doing their business from the balcony! Heading up the street any further past the hotel is a little scary.On night two, in the early hours - around 2AM there was a rave going on with loud music, swearing, screaming and shouting - possibly Pete Doherty and Amy Winehouse had checked in? There was no number to call down to reception and we were a little too frightened to leave the room!Didn't use the restaurant - didn't look like anyone else was either although the hotel seemed very quiet.All in all, a reasonable hotel, centrally located but don't expect any service or anything more than the basics!
Reviews.Author: trendytraveller112

Reviews.Content: Viva Espanya Basic? Basically awful! Our welcome pack in room 215 was a poo in the toilet. The toilet that flushed into the dwarf sized bath. The bedspreads are laundered bi-annually. The tele did not work. The wardrobe was covered in lovely graffiti and notches similar to the ones found in prison cells.
Reviews.Author: Pretzel-Fritzl

Reviews.Content: Very good For a 2* hotel, it was very correct and good. Service at the reception is very helpful - there is a lobby where you can rest or wait too. Rooms aren't exceptional but quality/price report, its very correct. Everything was very clean and the breakfast is also very good, for a quite reasonable price. Location is excellent. I would return and recommend it.
Reviews.Author: karenkupfer
